class.name: Arbalist
class.desc: With a huge crossbow known as a ballista, this guy is not afraid to fire huge bolts, destroying minions and frail summons.

class.name: Assassin
class.desc: A shadowy figure who strikes swiftly, instantly killing badly wounded enemies...

class.name: Buccaneer
class.desc: This charismatic lady uses her wit and charm to get the attention of the most dangerous enemies.

class.name: Arcanist
class.desc: A mysterious girl-plant hybrid, capable of manipulating gravity to stun slow enemies and heal allies.

class.name: Fencer
class.desc: Using precise swordfighting and outstanding reflexes, fencers always strike back.

class.name: Wizard
class.desc: By mixing magic and martial arts, the wizard's sword deals both slashing and magic damage.

class.name: Troubadour
class.desc: The songs and tales of the troubadour have great psychological effects on their allies, healing their wounds.

class.name: Scientist
class.desc: Using top-notch medical gear, the scientist can cure any weird disease, and close the worst wounds.

class.name: Astrologer
class.desc: The astrologer's magic is based on precise mathematical knowledge, striking all enemies with falling comets.

class.name: Gladiator
class.desc: Most gladiators are very deadly, using wild tactics to attack multiple enemies at once...

class.name: Shaman
class.desc: Young shamans pray for the great Yggdrasil Tree, granting weakened allies better defenses for a turn.

class.name: Sovereign
class.desc: The mere presence of noble blood on the battlefield inspires all units, increasing their strength, speed, toughness..

class.name: Android
class.desc: A product of ancient civilizations, possessing strong defenses and an immunity to status ailments.

class.name: Fighter
class.desc: Fighters love to fight, and this one is no exception. Simply being in battle pleases him, curing weak wounds.

class.name: Soldier
class.desc: With new weapons come new tactics, that soldiers use by staying behind the front line, preparing sandbags to protect allies.

class.name: Wildling
class.desc: A young man from the wild, who can call nearby beasts to help from time to time...
